topic.title: Configure Static IP Address
topic.shortdesc: This topic describes how to assign a static IP address to the LAN network interface when the PBX is in Single network mode.

ol.li: Go to Settings Systems Network Basic Settings .
In the Hostname field, enter a host name.
In the Mode field, select Single mode.

Select Static IP Address and enter the network information as follows.Consult your network administrator to get the network information.
IP Address: Enter the IP address that is assigned to the PBX.
Subnet Mask: Enter the subnet mask.
Gateway: Enter the gateway address.
Preferred DNS Server: Enter the IP address of preferred DNS server.
Alternative DNS Server: Optional. Enter the IP address of alternative DNS server.
IP Address 2: Optional. Enter a second IP address for the PBX.According to your network environment, you may need to set another IP address to allow users in different IP segment to access the PBX.
Subnet Mask 2: Optional. Enter another subnet mask for the second IP address.
Click Save and reboot the PBX to take effect.
